content: Here is the thing Gary: Your eCPM is going to cost you in real terms $100s of dollars when it comes to organic vs <$20 with ad dollars. You need to combine good content (not bandwagoning by creating memes or whatever is appearing in everyones feeds or bullshit quotes) with ad dollars to really win. Also, a great way to build organic following is via FB groups which is largely immune from the Newsfeed algorithm and will definitely help you build a community quickly (with time, effort and no ad dollars).
